select count(a.gpdm) from GPZB a, ( select b.*,c.bgmc,c.bgzxrq,c.yjjgmc,row_number() over(Partition by b.t_gpzb_id order by c.bgzxrq desc) AS rk from BGPJB b,BGJBXXB c where b.t_bgjbxxb_id=c.t_bgjbxxb_id ) h,GSZB j where length(a.gpdm)=6
a.gpdm like '%$gpdm$%'
a.gpjc like '%$gpjc$%'
and a.t_gpzb_id=h.t_gpzb_id and h.rk=1 and a.t_gszb_id=j.t_gszb_id
h.yjjgmc like '%$yjjgmc$%'
h.bzpjsz = #bzpjsz#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_.*, ROWNUM rownum_ FROM ( select h.yjjgmc,j.hylb,a.gpdm,a.gpjc,h.t_bgjbxxb_id,h.bzpjsz,h.bgmc,h.bgzxrq from GPZB a, ( select b.*,c.bgmc,c.bgzxrq,c.yjjgmc,row_number() over(Partition by b.t_gpzb_id order by c.bgzxrq desc) AS rk from BGPJB b,BGJBXXB c where b.t_bgjbxxb_id=c.t_bgjbxxb_id ) h,GSZB j where length(a.gpdm)=6
a.gpdm like '%$gpdm$%'
a.gpjc like '%$gpjc$%'
and a.t_gpzb_id=h.t_gpzb_id and h.rk=1 and a.t_gszb_id=j.t_gszb_id
h.yjjgmc like '%$yjjgmc$%'
h.bzpjsz = #bzpjsz#
order by $orderby$ ) row_ WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE rownum_ >#begin#
